price: Dájúdájú ìyẹn, àríyànjiyàn àwọn èrò inú Iná, òdodo mà ni.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
